---
name: Feature Request
about: Suggest a new feature or module
title: "[FEAT] "
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Context
What problem does this solve? Which gameplay/printing scenario benefits?

## Proposed Feature
Describe the feature, new module type, or parameter.

## Expected Behavior
How should it work from the user's perspective?

## Print Considerations
- Minimum detail size respected (≥ 0.6mm)?
- Wall thickness maintained (≥ 1.6mm)?
- Fits BambuLab A1 bed or auto-splits?
- Supportless / low-support printing possible?

## Definition of Done
- [ ] Feature implemented and generating correct geometry
- [ ] Mesh is manifold / watertight
- [ ] UI properties added to panel
- [ ] PROJECT_STATE.md updated
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md entry added
- [ ] Tested: install addon → generate → export STL → slice
